info.title: Alternative Token Menu & Token Resize update

changes.content: Added TokenResize: resize to fit canvas, custom resize.
Added add option to disable first-token respecting in the Auto-Sort Initiative module.
Added NPC reaction macro generation to the OGL 5e sheet macro generator.
Added a paste menu for TableExport tables.
Fixed settings dialog footer being awfully positioned on low DPI screens.

Fixed committing invalid data to cache: set enhancementSuiteEnabled without committing it to cache Previous methods committed that statement to cache which led to enhancementSuiteEnabled being set when R20ES is not active.
